description: This table contains information on the due status of health maintenance topics.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_UNTL_DT
columns.description: The date until which a Health Maintenance topic is postponed.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The postpone reason category number for a Health Maintenance topic which was postponed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HMT_LAST_UPDATE_DT
columns.description: The date when the patient's qualified Health Maintenance topic due status was last updated.

columns.name: HM_ORDER_STATUS_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates if the Health Maintenance (HM) topic has been addressed by signing an order. If an appropriate active order was found during the HM update, this will be set to yes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ACTIVE_SUBTOPIC_ID
columns.description: Stores the active subtopic for a combination topic

columns.name: ACTIVE_SUBTOPIC_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.

columns.name: ACTIVE_HM_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Stores the Health Maintenance plan that is currently active for the topic

columns.name: ACTIVE_HM_PLAN_ID_HM_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Health Maintenance Plan record.

columns.name: HM_TENTATIVE_YN
columns.description:
Boolean value indicating whether the Health Maintenance topic's next follow-up is tentative and requiring review.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HM_ORDER_STATUS_YN

columns.name: HM_ACTIVE_SERIES_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the active immunization series the patient is currently on.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


COVID-19 Pfizer 2-dose series
